text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

name: Senthak
text:
Yo, [Player]-kun!
You're on break too, right?
Perfect timing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun, you too!
No, I was just wandering around Enoshima because it was break time—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I ended up buying a bunch of merchandise.
After all, just the words "local exclusive" make you excited, don't they!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text: I was thinking of going to the beach after this, how about you come with me, [Player]-kun?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, thanks!
Hehe, I was surprised when I heard about the swimsuit photoshoot for work, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If I'm going to do it anyway, I thought about various designs with everyone at the agency (Creative Brain)!
It's a pretty good design, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I worked pretty hard, so when you say that...
Hehe, it makes me happy!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, that's right, [Player]-kun!
If you don't have any plans after this, why don't we stroll along the beach together?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so...?
When I designed it, I was so engrossed in it, so I'm not really aware, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To be told that directly by you...
I-I'm a little embarrassed.
Hehe, thank you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
M-More importantly, do you have time after this?
I was thinking of strolling along the beach, and I'd like to do it with you...
Is that alright?

options.text: That's right, why don't you try this?
It seems to be an Enoshima specialty.

name: Senthak
text:
It's an Enoshima local exclusive, right!
I got it myself too.
Limited editions always make you excited, don't they!?

name: Senthak
text:
Hey, [Player]-kun.
Since we're here,
why don't we apply it to each other?

name: Senthak
text:
After all, when it comes to summer and the beach,
applying sun oil is a must-do event,
isn't it!?

name: Senthak
text:
I saw a lot of things in the immigrant ship's archives,
and I always wanted to try it at least once.
Hehe, I'm looking forward to it!

name: Senthak
text:
Whoa!
If that's the case, my jacket is in the way, isn't it?
Please wait a moment...

name: Senthak
text:
Alright, perfect!
First, [Player]-kun,
I'm counting on you, okay?

name: Senthak
text:
I'm big, so it'll be hard to apply, right?
If you get tired, I'll switch, so
let me know right away, okay?

name: Senthak
text:
Ohh, it's cool and feels good.
It's seriously amazing,
my tension is skyrocketing!

name: Senthak
text:
S-Somehow, I'm feeling warm...
Hehe, [Player]-kun, your hands
feel really good...

[Player] and Senthak enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Senthak
text:
Thanks to you, one of my dreams came true.
Hehe, I sure got the best memory, didn't I!?

name: Senthak
text:
Alright, it's my turn next!
Leave it to me, because I'll sure to
apply it nicely for you!
